records.note_contesto: A 44-year-old Iraqi man was found dead in a tent in Lesvos, suspected to have died of a heart attack.
records.evidenza_testuale: 44 years old Iraqi men who arrived in Lesvos on the 6th of September 2017 , has been found dead at in the tent in . In upcoming days there is planned an autopsy but after initial assesment done by doctor from local hospital the person has died because of heart attack.

records.location_details: Sea area of Text removed - Operational Area
records.note_contesto: SAR operation for a boat in distress with 5 estimated people on board, no casualties reported.
records.evidenza_testuale: Dead persons: 0, Injured persons: 0, Missing persons: 0, Estimated people on board: 5

records.note_contesto: A SAR operation for a migrant vessel with 23 people on board resulted in one crew member sustaining minor injuries to his leg during the transfer of migrants.
records.evidenza_testuale: Subject: CBV crew member injured during a SAR operation, During this SAR operation a suffered small injures in one of his legs.

records.note_contesto: A Frontex member was involved in a unilateral motorbike accident and sustained injuries.
records.evidenza_testuale: Injured persons: 1, Subject: Unilateral traffic accident FX member, On July 21st, around a FX had a motorbike accident by himself.

records.note_contesto: Incidents involving aggressive migrants throwing stones and damaging vehicles. The form states 10 injured persons. The narrative specifies 'several injuries among protesters' and '2 HP officers have been injured'.
records.evidenza_testuale: Injured persons: 10, There have been several injuries among protesters. 2 HP officers have been injured as well.
